entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Berens River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berens River Airport 03:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %

Dewpoint: -33.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:24 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
